====== DESCRIPTION ======

Superposition is turning 1 year old in August, and we are celebrating with our annual show in Los Angeles.

Join a roster of multidisciplinary artists, mentors, and a community focused on a socially conscious approach to art.

https://form.jotform.com/91425573540153


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Visit SuperpositionGallery.com and click APPLY

or use the JotForm link provided https://form.jotform.com
